title: Unfair Games
body:
After fronting another 4v5 loss in which the game was very close i feel the need to express my thoughts.

My suggestion is that, if somebody has left the game for a moderate percentage of the game around 30% or so, they should take all the teams LP loss
I believe it is fair as they practically anchored the other 4 into a loss, and if the whole loss goes on them the LP is still balanced
The other 4 team members will not win or lose LP ( will receive 0 ), While the enemy 5 still gain LP as normal.
https://gyazo.com/10e7d0de7730876301c3ccf6e7da35b1

Thoughts?
